import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests
apiClient.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});// Auth API
const authAPI={register:(email,password,full_name,user_type)=>apiClient.post('/auth/register',{email,password,full_name,user_type}),login:(email,password)=>apiClient.post('/auth/login',{email,password}),getMe:()=>apiClient.get('/auth/me')};// Developer API
const developerAPI={getAvailable:()=>apiClient.get('/developers/available'),getProfile:developerId=>apiClient.get("/developers/".concat(developerId)),updateProfile:(developerId,data)=>apiClient.put("/developers/".concat(developerId),data),setAvailabilityStatus:(developerId,status)=>apiClient.put("/developers/".concat(developerId,"/availability-status"),{status}),getAvailabilitySlots:developerId=>apiClient.get("/developers/".concat(developerId,"/availability-slots")),addAvailabilitySlot:(developerId,start_time,end_time)=>apiClient.post("/developers/".concat(developerId,"/availability-slots"),{start_time,end_time})};// Bookings API
const bookingsAPI={createBooking:(developer_id,scheduled_at,duration_minutes)=>apiClient.post('/bookings',{developer_id,scheduled_at,duration_minutes}),getUserBookings:userId=>apiClient.get("/bookings/user/".concat(userId)),getBooking:bookingId=>apiClient.get("/bookings/".concat(bookingId)),confirmBooking:bookingId=>apiClient.put("/bookings/".concat(bookingId,"/confirm")),startCall:bookingId=>apiClient.put("/bookings/".concat(bookingId,"/start-call")),endCall:(bookingId,actual_duration_minutes,quality_stats)=>apiClient.put("/bookings/".concat(bookingId,"/end-call"),{actual_duration_minutes,quality_stats}),cancelBooking:(bookingId,reason)=>apiClient.put("/bookings/".concat(bookingId,"/cancel"),{reason})};// Payments API
const paymentsAPI={createPaymentIntent:(booking_id,payment_method)=>apiClient.post('/payments/create-payment-intent',{booking_id,payment_method}),confirmPayment:(booking_id,payment_intent_id,payment_method_id)=>apiClient.post('/payments/confirm-payment',{booking_id,payment_intent_id,payment_method_id}),getTransactions:()=>apiClient.get('/payments/transactions'),getTransaction:transactionId=>apiClient.get("/payments/transaction/".concat(transactionId)),processRefund:(booking_id,refund_amount)=>apiClient.post('/payments/refund',{booking_id,refund_amount}),getWalletBalance:()=>apiClient.get('/payments/wallet/balance'),updateWalletBalance:(amount,currency)=>apiClient.put('/payments/wallet/update',{amount,currency})};// Reviews API
const reviewsAPI={createReview:(booking_id,rating,review_text)=>apiClient.post('/reviews',{booking_id,rating,review_text}),getDeveloperReviews:developerId=>apiClient.get("/reviews/developer/".concat(developerId)),getUserReviews:userId=>apiClient.get("/reviews/user/".concat(userId)),updateReview:(reviewId,rating,review_text)=>apiClient.put("/reviews/".concat(reviewId),{rating,review_text}),deleteReview:reviewId=>apiClient.delete("/reviews/".concat(reviewId))};export{authAPI,developerAPI,bookingsAPI,paymentsAPI,reviewsAPI,apiClient};
